QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, cmn_features.id odf_pk, cmn_features.code code, cmn_features.is_restricted is_restricted, case when cmn_features.is_restricted >= 1.0 and cmn_features.is_restricted <= 1.0 then 'Checkmark' end is_restricted_image, case when cmn_features.is_restricted >= 1.0 and cmn_features.is_restricted <= 1.0 then (select name from cmn_lookups_v where lookup_type = 'ODF_IMAGES' and lookup_code = 'Checkmark' and language_code = user_context.language_code) end is_restricted_image_nls, case when cmn_features.is_restricted >= 1.0 and cmn_features.is_restricted <= 1.0 then 'range-1-1-null' end is_restricted_map, case when cmn_features.is_restricted >= 1.0 and cmn_features.is_restricted <= 1.0 then (select name from cmn_lookups_v where lookup_type = 'ODF.OBJECT.CMN_FEATURE.IS_RESTRICTED' and lookup_code = 'range-1-1-null' and language_code = user_context.language_code) end is_restricted_map_nls, ( SELECT P.ID FROM CMN_PAGES P WHERE P.ID in ( SELECT DECODE( CMN_PAGES.PRINCIPAL_TYPE, 'SYSTEM', CMN_PAGES.ID, NVL( CMN_PAGES.ORIGINATING_PAGE_ID, CMN_PAGES.ID ) ) FROM CMN_INSTANCE_PAGES, CMN_PAGES WHERE CMN_INSTANCE_PAGES.PAGE_FRAME_ID = CMN_PAGES.ID AND CMN_INSTANCE_PAGES.OBJECT_INSTANCE_ID = CMN_FEATURES.ID AND CMN_INSTANCE_PAGES.OBJECT_TYPE = 'cmn_feature' ) ) page_layout, FEATURE_NAME.name name, FEATURE_NAME.description description, cmn_features.created_date created_date, cmn_features.last_updated_date last_updated_date, cmn_features.enabled enabled, case when cmn_features.enabled >= 1.0 and cmn_features.enabled <= 1.0 then 'Checkmark' end enabled_image, case when cmn_features.enabled >= 1.0 and cmn_features.enabled <= 1.0 then (select name from cmn_lookups_v where lookup_type = 'ODF_IMAGES' and lookup_code = 'Checkmark' and language_code = user_context.language_code) end enabled_image_nls, case when cmn_features.enabled >= 1.0 and cmn_features.enabled <= 1.0 then 'range-1-1-null' end enabled_map, case when cmn_features.enabled >= 1.0 and cmn_features.enabled <= 1.0 then (select name from cmn_lookups_v where lookup_type = 'ODF.OBJECT.CMN_FEATURE.ENABLED' and lookup_code = 'range-1-1-null' and language_code = user_context.language_code) end enabled_map_nls , user_context.user_id odf_user_id from cmn_features cmn_features inner join (select u.id user_id, u.user_name, u.locale, l.language_code from cmn_sec_users u, cmn_languages l where u.language_id = l.id) user_context on user_context.user_id = user_context.user_id , srm_resources CREATED, srm_resources UPDATED, cmn_captions_nls FEATURE_NAME where 1 = 1 and cmn_features.created_by = CREATED.user_id and cmn_features.last_updated_by = UPDATED.user_id and FEATURE_NAME.table_name = 'CMN_FEATURES' and FEATURE_NAME.pk_id = cmn_features.id and FEATURE_NAME.language_code = user_context.language_code
